attributes.action: make sure that all exams are checked for proper English.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exams are written but are not helpful to the students who are taking them due to the way questions are laid out. The undersigned propose that all exams must be checked for quality of English before they are released to students. As a huge amount of marks are lost because of lack of English quality.
